alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 27 at 11:55PM PST until December 28 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Isolated pockets of temperatures near 30 are possible in the Ojai Valley and near Malibu Canyon and Agoura. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and Santa Clarita Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
